description: PoShAdmin makes managing computers a breeze with PowerShell. It fills the gap for remote management, remote registry changes, parallel execution. If you ever had to run a piece of PowerShell code on more than 20 machines in a short amount of time, PoShAdmin is for you.
summary: PoShAdmin is a set of PowerShell tools to ease SysAdmin life. It is a PowerShell module that enables faster turnaround time for remote troubleshooting and computer management.
author: Greg Szabo,  PoShAdmin.Net
